unnormalised: Yeah, I saw Dr. Sharma's talk, but Prof. Kumar's keynote last week was way more insightful, IMHO. Mrs. Iyer, CEO of the company, also gave a pretty good presentation.
normalised: Yeah, I saw Doctor Sharma's talk, but Professor Kumar's keynote last week was way more insightful, in my humble opinion. Missus Iyer, C-E-O of the company, also gave a pretty good presentation.
